Title: Tanken Driland: 1000-nen no Mahou
Description:
["1,000 years after Princess Mikoto's era, all hunters have been sealed into cards due to a certain incident in the past. Adventurous boy Hagan becomes the key to freeing these sealed hunters, and travels along with his friends to find these cards, sometimes facing treacherous battles.", '
', '
', '
', '
(Source: ANN)']
Characters: ['Raichouka, Faylin', 'Kisuikyou, Nagare', 'Gekienken, Kibamaru', 'Hagan', 'Pan', 'Koukikoushin, Dior', 'Moon Angel Clara', 'Haruka']
Voices: ['Shimamura, Yuu', 'Nojima, Kenji', 'Kumai, Motoko', 'Yamaguchi, Mayumi', 'Ishida, Akira', 'Kouda, Mariko']
Staff: [['Kuroda, Narumi', 'Director'], ['Hanae', 'Theme Song Performance'], ['Valshe', 'Theme Song Performance'], ['Watanabe, Koudai', 'Chief Animation Director, Character Design']]
